diff_act: 1.generate a confirmation message upon saving data

regen.absent_element: data handling when close button is clicked
regen.new_specification: If the close button is clicked, the system shall prompt a confirmation dialog that allows users to save their data before closing.

regen.absent_element: The action of clearing entered data when cancel is clicked, without specific context
regen.new_specification: The system shall clear all entered data when the cancel button is clicked, regardless of the context such as creating/adding a new user.

regen.absent_element: specific operation following clicking the close button
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that all unsaved data is preserved when the user clicks the close button, after displaying the warning message.

label: The system shall direct the user to the xxx Page if the user chooses to click the close button without entering any data.
absence: situation of clicking the close button
